data.name: wikipedia_region_in_tab
data.marketing: A simple plugin that adds wikipedia content about a property's region in one of the property tabs.
data.description: This plugin inserts a wikipedia page about the property region into the property details tab. No special instructions, just install the plugin.
data.change_log: v1.1 Jomres 9.7.4 related changes & SSL tweaks v1.2 Remaining globals cleanup and jr_gettext refactor related changes. v1.3 jr_gettext tweaks. v1.4 French language file added v1.5 Language files updated
data.author: Vince Wooll
